sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Dow topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 3.2%.
Year to date, Dow has lost about 0.1% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is American Express, trading down 1.8%.
American Express is showing a gain of 22.8% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Procter & Gamble, trading down 1.4%, and Exxon Mobil, trading up 2.1% on the day.
